sqlMap.select:
SELECT FACTORID as "factorid", USEZS as "usezs", DATASOURCE as "datasource", SITEID as "siteid", SITENAME as "sitename", MONITORID as "monitorid", MNID as "mnid", ISONLINE as "isonline", ISARTIFICIAL as "isartificial", FACTORNAME as "factorname", UNIT as "unit", MONITORNAME as "monitorname", DISCHARGEPORTID as "dischargeportid", DISCHARGEPORTNAME as "dischargeportname", PROCID as "procid", COUNTRYPOINT as "countrypoint", CITYPOINT as "citypoint", COMPANYPOINT as "companypoint", HIGHLIMIT as "highlimit", LOWLIMIT as "lowlimit", NKHIGHLIMIT as "nkhighlimit", NKLOWLIMIT as "nklowlimit", PROCEDURE_ID as "procedureId", PROCEDURE_NAME as "procedureName", DEPARTMENTID as "departmentid", DEPARTMENT_NAME as "departmentName" FROM ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE_FACTOR WHERE 1=1
$orderBy$

SELECT FACTORID as "factorid", FACTORNAME as "factorname", UNIT as "unit", HIGHLIMIT as "highlimit", LOWLIMIT as "lowlimit" FROM ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE_FACTOR WHERE 1=1
siteid = #siteid#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE_FACTOR (FACTORID, USEZS, DATASOURCE, SITEID, SITENAME, MONITORID, MNID, ISONLINE, ISARTIFICIAL, FACTORNAME, UNIT, MONITORNAME, DISCHARGEPORTID, DISCHARGEPORTNAME, PROCID, COUNTRYPOINT, CITYPOINT, COMPANYPOINT, HIGHLIMIT, LOWLIMIT, NKHIGHLIMIT, NKLOWLIMIT, PROCEDURE_ID, PROCEDURE_NAME, DEPARTMENTID, DEPARTMENT_NAME ) VALUES (#factorid:VARCHAR#, #usezs:VARCHAR#, #datasource:VARCHAR#, #siteid:VARCHAR#, #sitename:VARCHAR#, #monitorid:VARCHAR#, #mnid:VARCHAR#, #isonline:VARCHAR#, #isartificial:VARCHAR#, #factorname:VARCHAR#, #unit:VARCHAR#, #monitorname:VARCHAR#, #dischargeportid:VARCHAR#, #dischargeportname:VARCHAR#, #procid:VARCHAR#, #countrypoint:VARCHAR#, #citypoint:VARCHAR#, #companypoint:VARCHAR#, #highlimit:VARCHAR#, #lowlimit:VARCHAR#, #nkhighlimit:VARCHAR#, #nklowlimit:VARCHAR#, #procedureId:VARCHAR#, #procedureName:VARCHAR#, #departmentid:VARCHAR#, #departmentName:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE_FACTOR SET FACTORID = #factorid#, USEZS = #usezs#, DATASOURCE = #datasource#, SITEID = #siteid#, SITENAME = #sitename#, MONITORID = #monitorid#, MNID = #mnid#, ISONLINE = #isonline#, ISARTIFICIAL = #isartificial#, FACTORNAME = #factorname#, UNIT = #unit#, MONITORNAME = #monitorname#, DISCHARGEPORTID = #dischargeportid#, DISCHARGEPORTNAME = #dischargeportname#, PROCID = #procid#, COUNTRYPOINT = #countrypoint#, CITYPOINT = #citypoint#, COMPANYPOINT = #companypoint#, HIGHLIMIT = #highlimit#, LOWLIMIT = #lowlimit#, NKHIGHLIMIT = #nkhighlimit#, NKLOWLIMIT = #nklowlimit#, PROCEDURE_ID = #procedureId#, PROCEDURE_NAME = #procedureName#, DEPARTMENTID = #departmentid#, DEPARTMENT_NAME = #departmentName# WHERE
